title: Did Ben Carson's family benefit from social care?
subtitle: Mims asserts that Ben Carson benefited from social welfare early in life, just to say that such programs have caused "the dissolution of the family unit" and "the American slave of African descent."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Dr. Ben Carson said, "The dissolution of the family unit and the welfare state enslave African Americans and destroy their future," but they received help from such programs in their youth.
